name: Lulu's Hot Pot
description:
Join Lulu as she spends the night in, making herself a nice hot pot of soup. Help her master the art of soup creation by adding the right ingredients and keeping the soup at the right temperature in order to make the best soups possible!

 How To Play :

✦ Click the + and - buttons on the screen to adjust the temperature to the green zone.

✦  It's time to put in the specific ingredient in the hot pot when the icon is enlarged.
✦ In the green zone, hold click and rotate your cursor in circles on the pot to stir and progress!
✦ Perfect each recipe before being able to move onto the next!
